name: The Bloody Claw
description:
Remember in The Lord of the Rings, when the hobbits stay overnight in that tavern? In this game you're not the mysterious stranger, or the hero. You're the Barman of that tavern.

Very basic pre-alpha game-play. Rough around the edges, and by no means complete. Very playable though, and who knows, you might even get some fun out of it. Did I mention there's puke?
